entry.title: Shure RMCE-LTG Remote + Mic Lightning Accessory Cable SE Earphones
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shure
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 99.99

Lightning cable enables SE Sound Isolating™ Earphones with detachable cables to connect with iOS devices with lightning connector for high-quality audio and communication control.

Product Details

The RMCE-LTG provides a major performance upgrade for all Apple iOS devices with a Lightning® connector in combination with Shure SE model Sound Isolating™ Earphones with detachable cables.

Incorporating a digital-to-analog convertor (DAC) and amplifier, the RMCE-LTG features state-of-the-art circuitry matched to the specific sonic and performance characteristics of SE Sound Isolating™ earphones.

Features:
  • Sleek, integrated remote/DAC-in-one design
  • Microphone placement optimized for clarity of speech and intelligibility of voice commands
  • Simple, plug-and-play operation for Apple iOS devices
  • Firmware upgradable with the ShurePlus™ MOTIV App
  • Certified via the Apple MFI program
  • High-quality digital audio playback (up to 24-bit/48 kHz) over Apple’s Lightning® connector
  • Voice transmission
  • Phone control
  • The Lightning Audio Module supports 3-button remote control functionality

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

entry.title: Sennheiser MKE 440 Professional Stereo Shotgun Microphone (MKE 440)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sennheiser
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 349.95

The MKE 440 has two aligned and matched mini shotgun mics ensuring that the MKE 440 captures the audio you want while rejecting off-axis noise. This feature sets it apart from conventional stereo microphones. With its optimized acoustic characteristics and adjustable sensitivity, the MKE 440 is ideally suited for speech, music or ambience. The stainless steel micro-mesh wind protection reduces wind noise and protects the fine high frequency details in your sound.

  • Dual mini shotgun mics create frontal focus
  • Suppression of ambience and background noise
  • Built-in elastic suspension and wind protection
  • 3-level sensitivity adjustment and low-cut
  • Compact, all-metal construction that fits on Standard size camera shoe mount

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

entry.title: Sennheiser ClipMic Digital Mobile Recording Microphone for iOS Devices
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sennheiser
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 199.00

Whether you are a journalist looking for an easy audio solution for field interviews, a lecturer that wants to record a talk or even a parent recording their child reciting a poem – the new digital clip-on microphones from Sennheiser and Apogee help you to capture sound professionally. ClipMic digital combines Apogee’s A/D conversion expertise with Sennheiser’s microphone design knowledge to give users optimum sound quality for their recordings – especially designed for iOS-devices with Lightning connector.

High Quality Recording

When paired with a modern Apple (iOS) device, ClipMic digital delivers exceptional audio quality. The ME 2 omni-directional lavalier microphone captures the sound source while screening out unwanted background noise. Then the in-line, high resolution signal converter developed by Apogee digitally transmits the sound via the Lightning connector with exceptional clarity.

Simplified Audio and Video Editing

MetaRecorder allows the application of metadata tags to your audio files while recording in the field. When these files are imported into Final Cut Pro on a Mac, the captured metadata greatly simplifies the process of organizing and editing your media to accelerate postproduction workflow. (Apple, iOS, iPad, iPhone, iPod and Final Cut Pro are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.)

General specifications:
  • Plug and play - connect ClipMic digital to the Lightning port on your iOS device and begin recording!
  • Sennheiser ME 2 microphone - omni-directional capsule delivers superb clarity and speech intelligibility
  • Lightning connector - is Apple MFi Certified to insure reliability
  • Digital interface - Apogee 24 bit/96 kHz digital interface designed specifically for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad or iPod touch) provides exceptional audio performance
  • Apogee MetaRecorder app – is a free download from the App Store making recording, tagging and organizing audio in the field simple and efficient

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: Samsung The Frame Customizable Bezel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TV Accessories
Price: 249.99 - 349.99 (3 variants)

Introducing The Frame from Samsung - a revolutionary way to think about your TV. When you're not watching the brilliant 4K UHD TV with HDR, it turns into a beautiful work of art on your wall. With an array of paintings, prints, photos, and frames to suit every mood and style, The Frame TV goes beyond entertainment and becomes an expression of you.

Choose from one hundred works of art

The Frame includes a gallery of professionally curated art, with one hundred free pieces worth thousands of dollars from ten different categories.

Expand your collection

Buy individual pieces or subscribe to an ever-increasing library of established and emerging artists’ work.

Customize The Frame to fit your style

Our Customizable Frame has the flexibility to fit into any home’s decor. You can change the black bezel to a wood, white or black frame, perfectly complementing your home.

The Frame hangs flush to the wall

Our No Gap Wall Mount, included with purchase of The Frame, means just that. The Frame hangs flush to the wall just like a real picture frame. It’s easy to tilt and adjust, and blends seamlessly with your decor.

Enjoy your art whatever the lighting

The Frame features a light sensor, which intelligently detects ambient light. It adjusts the color and brightness settings so your art always looks natural regardless of where it is or what the time of day.

Features:
  • Art Mode
  • Samsung Collection
  • Premium UHD TV
  • 4K HDR Pro

entry.title: Marantz TT-15S1 Reference Belt Drive Turntable with Cartridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Marantz
Type: Turntables
Price: 1499.00

Analog recording is still very alive. Quality turntables are still in demand. Digital discs simply set new performance standards that turntables must meet. Many cherished records may never be issued on digital formats. Good turntables are now more important than ever. Marantz embraces an audiophile quality turntable with AC servo belt-drive and low-coloration tone arm to answer the need for a high performance source component for the analog record.

General specifications:
  • Low-Resonance High-Density Acrylic Chassis and Platter
  • Floating Motor Mount Construction
  • Asynchronous AC Motor
  • Belt Drive System with Endless Silicon Belt
  • Anodized Aluminum Straight Type Tone Arm
  • Magnetic Type Anti-Skating Mechanism
  • Fine Adjustable Counter Weight
  • Solid Aluminum 3 points Support Feet
  • Wood Base, High Quality MM Cartridge
  • "Clever Clamp" by Souther Engineering

entry.summary:
Vendor: Devialet
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 329.00

Dialog is the hub that allows you to connect several Phantom together wirelessly, from 2 Phantom to 24 Phantom, to create Hi-Fi or Multi-Room systems.

Dialog is necessary to connect more than one Phantom for a multi-room or stereo experience. Dialog is not necessary to play online streaming services through Bluetooth to one Phantom.

Designed and assembled in France. Only works with Phantom Premier: Phantom Gold (4500W), Phantom Silver (3000W), Classic Phantom (1200W).

entry.title: Devialet Care 3 Year Insurance for Devialet Phantom
entry.summary:
Vendor: Devialet
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 299.00

Protect your investment

With Devialet Care, your Phantom Premier investment is protected with an extra year of warranty and can be replaced once at a preferential price in case of accidental damage (see Devialet Care replacement prices below).

  • 3 years Guarantee Extension
  • Protect your Phantom up to 30 days after its purchase
  • Covers one accidental Incident
Why signup for Devialet Care?

Our three-year insurance policy makes sure you’re covered. Instantly. For one instance of accidental damage or breakage. Gold standard, guaranteed.

How do I activate Devialet Care

To activate Devialet Care, head on over to your user account. In just a few clicks, you're all covered.

Do I have to purchase Devialet Care at the same time as Phantom

You've got 30 days to buy Devialet Care from the moment you purchase Phantom. Make sure you get covered before it's too late...!

entry.title: Audio-Technica VMN70SP Replacement Stylus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audio Technica
Type: Audio Accessories
Price: 89.00

Replacement stylus for VM670SP

Even the finest diamond stylus becomes worn after an extended period of play.The styli in our VM cartridges are no different. But it is easy to replace the stylus and continue to use your cartridge. Our renewed VM cartridges have 7 styli and 3 types of bodies to choose from. Not only is it not necessary to buy an entirely new cartridge, but you can also enjoy the experience of upgrading your stylus or trying a new cartridge/stylus combination.

The cartridge becomes worn after an extended period of play, even the finest diamond stylus. Our VM cartridges can be used again for a long time only by replacing the stylus. Our renewed VM cartridges have 7 styli and 3 types of bodies. Not only it is not necessary to buy the cartridge itself, but also you experience the enjoyment of upgrade or various combination of VM cartridges.

General specifications:
  • Conical (3mil) stylus
  • Nude Rectangular Shank construction
  • Grey
